about_the_game:
Really Simple Golf is a climbing platformer golf, that blends chill vibes with precision driven adventure. Embark on an adventure across vibrant courses, mastering tricky shoots, navigating obstacles, and sinking those perfect putts.

⛳ Looking for a relaxing round? Take your time, enjoy the scenery, and perfect your "swing". Every obstacle offers a unique challenge, perfect for unwinding after a long day.

⛳ Feeling the need for speed? The mechanics of the game allows you to speedrun all the levels. I am very curious about that :D

⛳ Please help me by adding the game to your wishlist! The more people add the game to their wishlists, the greater the chance that Steam will show it to more people.

⛳ Your feedback shapes the game! I am constantly working to improve the experience, and your feedback is everything to me. Share your thoughts about the game wherever you want. On Steam, Reddit, Discord, X, call me, send a carrier pigeon... you get my point. 😅

⛳ Join the community and have fun!



Features:

  • Physics-based
  • Precision driven
  • Easy mechanics
  • Designed for casual players and hardcore speedrunners
  • Different levels
  • Supports many languages (Doing my best with all the translations, apologies in advance)
  • Some graphic settings for different machines
  • Feedback is more than welcome

⛳ You don't have to rush if you don't want to. Just have fun



⛳ Enjoy the moment



⛳ It's okay if you don't succeed the first time, or even after a few tries...



It's just Really Simple Golf.

ADD TO WISHLIST ⛳

Add the game to your wishlist and get ready for an adventure that’s about to begin! 🏌️‍♂️✨


About the Game


Really Simple Golf is a climbing platformer golf, that blends chill vibes with precision driven adventure. Embark on an adventure across vibrant courses, mastering tricky shoots, navigating obstacles, and sinking those perfect putts.

⛳ Looking for a relaxing round? Take your time, enjoy the scenery, and perfect your "swing". Every obstacle offers a unique challenge, perfect for unwinding after a long day.

⛳ Feeling the need for speed? The mechanics of the game allows you to speedrun all the levels. I am very curious about that :D

⛳ Please help me by adding the game to your wishlist! The more people add the game to their wishlists, the greater the chance that Steam will show it to more people.

⛳ Your feedback shapes the game! I am constantly working to improve the experience, and your feedback is everything to me. Share your thoughts about the game wherever you want. On Steam, Reddit, Discord, X, call me, send a carrier pigeon... you get my point. 😅

⛳ Join the community and have fun!



Features:

  • Physics-based
  • Precision driven
  • Easy mechanics
  • Designed for casual players and hardcore speedrunners
  • Different levels
  • Supports many languages (Doing my best with all the translations, apologies in advance)
  • Some graphic settings for different machines
  • Feedback is more than welcome

⛳ You don't have to rush if you don't want to. Just have fun



⛳ Enjoy the moment



⛳ It's okay if you don't succeed the first time, or even after a few tries...



It's just Really Simple Golf.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
  • Processor: Any 2.0 Ghz to 2.69 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: Any 2.69 Ghz And UP
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Really Simple Golf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any 2.0 Ghz to 2.69 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card with 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Any 2.69 Ghz And UP
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Really Simple Golf is a climbing platformer golf, that blends chill vibes with precision driven adventure. Embark on an adventure across vibrant courses, mastering tricky shoots, navigating obstacles, and sinking those perfect putts.
